description.main: Specialized security services tailored for modern organizations. I focus on deep manual analysis, secure code review, and targeted penetration testing to help build resilient and secure systems.

services.title:
Penetration
Testing
services.description: Web, network, and Active Directory security assessments with a focus on real-world attack paths and high-impact vulnerabilities. Includes detailed reporting and prioritized remediation steps.

services.title:
Source Code
Analysis

services.title:
Security
Consulting

services.title:
Exploit
Development
services.description: Development of custom proof-of-concept exploits to demonstrate vulnerability impact, aid internal remediation, and support research initiatives.

services.title:
Threat
Modeling
services.description: Identify attack surfaces and potential weaknesses across your application architecture. Tailored for startups, SaaS platforms, and teams planning secure releases.
